descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 25 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Welcome to Newton’s Playground, the ultimate VR sandbox where imagination knows no limits! Build wild contraptions, cause hilarious chaos, or simply relax and experiment in a world where physics is your playground.

# Tons of Maps 🗺️
Role-play, experiment, or goof around across 15+ unique maps, each packed with possibilities.

[media]

# Different Avatars 🐾
Be whoever (or whatever) you want, play as a human, a mischievous cat, and more avatars coming soon!

[media]

# Drivable Vehicles 🚗
Race, drift, and stunt your way through fully drivable vehicles that bring chaos and comedy to every map.

[media]

# Build 🛠️
From bathtub cars and flying machines to full-on rockets, if you can dream it, you can build it.


[media]
 
  # Weapons 🔫

Unleash tons of weapons and discover new ways to break the rules of reality. 
[media]

Be whoever (or whatever) you want, play as a human, a mischievous cat, and more avatars coming soon!

Race, drift, and stunt your way through fully drivable vehicles that bring chaos and comedy to every map.

# Build 🛠️
From bathtub cars and flying machines to full-on rockets, if you can dream it, you can build it.
